computedFields.name: OPTY_OWN_NM
computedFields.saqlExpression: 'UDH.USR_NM'
computedFields.label: OPTY_OWN_NM

computedFields.name: Flip_FISCAL_YR_NM
computedFields.saqlExpression: "FY " + FLIP_DT_Year_Fiscal
computedFields.label: Flip_FISCAL_YR_NM

computedFields.name: Flip_FISCAL_QTR_NM
computedFields.saqlExpression: "Q" + FLIP_DT_Quarter_Fiscal
computedFields.label: Flip_FISCAL_QTR_NM

computedFields.name: Flip_FISCAL_MO_NM
computedFields.saqlExpression:
case 
when 'FLIP_DT_Month_Fiscal' == "01" then "Feb"
when 'FLIP_DT_Month_Fiscal' == "02" then "Mar"
when 'FLIP_DT_Month_Fiscal' == "03" then "Apr"
when 'FLIP_DT_Month_Fiscal' == "04" then "May"
when 'FLIP_DT_Month_Fiscal' == "05" then "Jun"
when 'FLIP_DT_Month_Fiscal' == "06" then "Jul"
when 'FLIP_DT_Month_Fiscal' == "07" then "Aug"
when 'FLIP_DT_Month_Fiscal' == "08" then "Sep"
when 'FLIP_DT_Month_Fiscal' == "09" then "Oct"
when 'FLIP_DT_Month_Fiscal' == "10" then "Nov"
when 'FLIP_DT_Month_Fiscal' == "11" then "Dec"
when 'FLIP_DT_Month_Fiscal' == "12" then "Jan"
end
computedFields.label: Flip_FISCAL_MO_NM

computedFields.name: OpportunityID
computedFields.saqlExpression: substr('Id',1,15)
computedFields.label: OpportunityID

computedFields.name: pipe_council_deal_band
computedFields.saqlExpression:
case
when 'SNP_CLOUD_AMT_TTL_PLN_FX' <= 0 then "7 - < $0"
when 'SNP_CLOUD_AMT_TTL_PLN_FX' <= 10000 then "6 - $0 - $10K"
when 'SNP_CLOUD_AMT_TTL_PLN_FX' <= 50000 then "5 - $10K - $50K"
when 'SNP_CLOUD_AMT_TTL_PLN_FX' <= 150000 then "4 - $50K - $150K"
when 'SNP_CLOUD_AMT_TTL_PLN_FX' <= 500000 then "3 - $150K - $500K"
when 'SNP_CLOUD_AMT_TTL_PLN_FX' <= 1000000 then "2 - $500K - $1M"
when 'SNP_CLOUD_AMT_TTL_PLN_FX' > 1000000 then "1 - $1M +"
end
computedFields.label: pipe_council_deal_band

computedFields.name: pipe_council_ecs_deal_band
computedFields.saqlExpression:
case
when 'SNP_CLOUD_AMT_TTL_PLN_FX' <= 0 then "8 - < $0"
when 'SNP_CLOUD_AMT_TTL_PLN_FX' <= 10000 then "7 - $0 - $10K"
when 'SNP_CLOUD_AMT_TTL_PLN_FX' <= 50000 then "6 - $10K - $50K"
when 'SNP_CLOUD_AMT_TTL_PLN_FX' <= 150000 then "5 - $50K - $150K"
when 'SNP_CLOUD_AMT_TTL_PLN_FX' <= 250000 then "4 - $150K - $250K"
when 'SNP_CLOUD_AMT_TTL_PLN_FX' <= 500000 then "3 - $250K - $500K"
when 'SNP_CLOUD_AMT_TTL_PLN_FX' <= 1000000 then "2 - $500K - $1M"
when 'SNP_CLOUD_AMT_TTL_PLN_FX' > 1000000 then "1 - $1M +"
end
computedFields.label: pipe_council_ecs_deal_band
